This land enters tapped.
{2}{G}{W}, {T}: Cache the top card of your library face-down. [i](Look at it, then exile it face down. Create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this Memory: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]

The Weft is not dead so long as we remember it.
